SUBSCRIPTIONS.description: KV namespace for storing push subscriptions and encrypted credentials

VAPID_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Public key for Web Push authentication. Generate with: `npx web-push generate-vapid-keys`

VAPID_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private key for Web Push authentication. Generate with: `npx web-push generate-vapid-keys`

VAPID_SUBJECT.description: Contact email for Web Push. Format: `mailto:your@email.com`

ENCRYPTION_SECRET.description: Master key for encrypting stored credentials. Use a random 32+ character string
